I think the box work best if the spirit is able to put the rest of his/her =
 
sentence on each side of the recording, as in reverse words...they finish=
 
what  they are talking about like this much of the time.  Wish I had a 
"=
Frank's  Box" too. sf
 
 
In a message dated 11/15/2011 1:07:22 P.M. Easter=
n Standard Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 

Wait a minute,=
 it's been my eperience, when radnom is working, it has  no 
adavntage, and=
 even does not work as well as linear or even manual sweep,  
and yet here =
I am, trying to get it to work, Screw that! 

Ya know wgat,  there ain't no=
 fraking patents on any of this crap, but I 
bet that changes as  the "expe=
rts" believe they can go down in paranormal 
history. Y'all can have  it, m=
eeza done! Then you can beat your other friends up 
and rip each other off =
 for perceived greatness. Have fun explaining that 
to God when you are cal=
led  before him--next year. 

I expected things to get really insane as we =
 entered 2012, that 
"prediction" is proving to be correct, as one time fri=
ends  turn on me and rip my 
heart out over an over. 

Alot of hurt feeling=
,  and offended people over the years.. pulling the 
plug!
